tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stores (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  location GEOGRAPHY,
  rating FLOAT,
  recommended_offer_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE offers (
    offer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    offer_name VARCHAR(100),
    discount FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Offers (
    offer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    validity_period TIMESTAMP,
    location_constraint GEOGRAPHY
);
